definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent

sentences.english: Hengda property, gold property, I would like to note life with a smile.
sentences.chinese: 恒达物业，金牌物业，谨以微笑注解风华人生。

sentences.english: Exactly schoolmate youth, in full flower, the direction landscape, encourages the writing.
sentences.chinese: 恰同学少年，风华正茂，指点江山，激扬文字。

sentences.english: Everything had disappeared except me. I still stood there like a weathered stone pillar.
sentences.chinese: 一切都没有了，只有我还站着，像一根风华的石柱。

sentences.english: Yellow paper, have you in the summer's handwriting.
sentences.chinese: 泛黄的纸张上，有着你当年那风华正茂的笔迹。

sentences.english: Disease cut Smith off in the best part of life.
sentences.chinese: 病魔使风华正茂的史密斯英年早逝。

sentences.english: Ruan comes from a Shandong village where his parents were farmers.
sentences.chinese: 阮风华来自山东省的一个小村庄，他的父母都是农民。

sentences.english: Physical activity is for people in the "prime of life".
sentences.chinese: 身体活动是“风华正茂”的青壮年人的事。

sentences.english: Elegance is a means sand, old is a Love.
sentences.chinese: 风华是一指流沙，苍老是一段年华。

definition: magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
coming from everywhere/from all over the place/gorgeous (of woman)/to ruin and overturn the state
variant of 風采|风采[feng1 cai3]
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
